title: Y lots of people dont know that Kennen can be supp.
body:
I came from China, now I'm studying in NZ, so I play the Oceania server. 

In Chinese server, if U pick Kennen as supp, no one would judge u. 

But in here, if I pick Kenn as supp, lots of people will say like "u noob" or "gg" or ask like "WTF Kenn supp?! "{{champion:85}}

What's going on?

replies.body: Its useable , but kennan as a support offers only initiation and his stun, which requires multiple hits to trigger. He provides no buffs , auras , debuffs , heals , and is relatively weak and squishy early on without items , so he isnt much good at peeling either. Other then applying damage he has no other way to protect his carry . If your playing with a group of competent players then theres no reason why it couldnt work , but its still really a kill lane , as kennan is simply not a support , and never will be.

annie's stun and poke is much more reliable in lane , and doesnt require her to get as close as kennen.  blitz is certainly a support as his kit is perfect for peeling and with all his cc he can control a fight very well, all he is lacking is poke , but with a pull/knockup/silence he is perfect as a support.  zyra is about the same as kennen, usable , but again there are much better choices.
coz no one here keeps up with pro games. Sure he's a little out of flavour atm but paired with kalista is he has incredible initiation
that actually sounds like a hella good comp

Well Kennen became a popular support because of his AOE initiation and CC but people were finding it hard to get INTO the fights, like they always have with Kennen, so Kalista+Kennen became extremely popular.

Kennen became a popular Support because a 'professional' player in a tournament played her and was successful.

Cause honestly Summoners how many of you plats down actually try something new Whether it works or not and wasn't played by a 'professional' Summoner.
lol bcoz, oceania server is full of troll people they dun know how to play tbh, kennen is awesome for team cc

Hello my fellow Chinese,

Unfortunately you have come to a server that doesn't like people being weird and sticks to the OCE meta. That said I still play Orianna, Kennen and Evelynn support myself. Who cares if they judge. If you make it work it works.

pisses me off when people say they have the worst server in the world. 40% OF OUR PLAYERS ARE BRONZE THATS THE HIGHEST IN THE WORLD GTFO, we are literally wallowing in our filth. oh and the point is nobody watches any pro games and thats why we suck

Did you know that Kennen use to be an ADC in season 3.

and yes, I did know that Kennen can Support I play her every time she is on Free champ rotation.

Oceanic people lag behind the changing meta. No one experiments because everyone is too busy trying out the new changes that Korea and Chinese teams are doing in LCK. 
Everyone here is on edge for some reason. They are quick to judge and the community generally don't like experiments in their normal games. 
if you're good at it then just do it.

If it's not super conservative meta (Thresh, Blitz, Naut, Sona, Janna, Soraka, Nami, Braum, Leona, Morganna, Kayle, Lux are the only accepted supps out of the 120~ champs)

You get reported by the ~~sheep~~ kangaroo people for a troll pick.
Like any non meta pick, kennen "can" work. But it is situational.
